content.description:
This is another high quality problem at the grade. Start 10' to the right of

Tiffany

. Pull yourself up small crimps on the otherwise blank face. It is a bit more difficult than the standard

Tiffany

problem.
content.location:
10 feet to the right of

Tiffany

.

content.description: This is a great problem at the grade. Start on crimps and pull over a small bulge to the top. Descend a V0- route off the backside.
content.location: This is on the obvious main face of the main Tiffany Boulder.

content.description: This is a crazy problem on a small, strangely shaped rock. To truly send this problem, you must limit yourself to using only footholds on the inside of the Gourd. Otherwise, you are doing a different and considerably easier boulder problem. Sit start on the bottom left with your feet on a large bulge in the back of the gourd (see photo). Work your way to the to the apex by stemming or any other means you can devise and top out. Once again, to be true to the problem, keep your feet inside the Gourd (it is very tempting at the end to do otherwise). 2 stars for being unique and challenging, but a bit contrived....
content.location:
This lies twenty feet to NW of

Tiffany

.

content.description:
Start low and right on the Gourd Boulder. Traverse over and finish the same as the standard

Gourd

problem. Half a star
content.location: This lies on The Gourd Boulder.
